derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: the noun from French formulaire or medieval Latin formularius (liber) ('book) of formulae', from Latin formula (see formula); the adjective (early 18th cent.) is directly from formula

means.word_mean: 1. (pharmacology) a book containing a compilation of pharmaceutical products with their formulas and methods of preparation
1. of or relating to or of the nature of a formula
